publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-73 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Rule 2.3.1—That the Parliament agrees the following dates under Rule 2.3.1: 28 June – 31 August 2003 (inclusive), 11 – 26 October 2003 (inclusive), 20 December 2003 – 4 January 2004 (inclusive), 14 February – 22 February 2004 (inclusive), 3 April – 18 April 2004 (inclusive) and 26 June – 29 August 2004 (inclusive). Supported by: Tavish Scott*
